title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Language Proficiency Improvement Through Hierarchical Problem-Solving Task Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language proficiency and experience in simple problem-solving
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% success by sequentially solving three-tiered language problems (basic-intermediate-advanced)
Learners reduce problem-solving time by 20% by applying cognitive load management strategies during difficulty-based problem-solving
Learners explain strategies acquired during language problem-solving at a level applicable to over 70% of real-world job situations through summative assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
